summary: Summoned by an unexpected phone call, an elderly woman visits the country cottage she lived in as a child. Memories of an orphan boy she knew 47 years ago come flooding back to her.
cast: Park Bo-Young|Joong-Ki Song|Yeong-ran Lee|Jang Young-Nam|Yeon-Seok Yoo|Hyang-gi Kim|Seung-mok Yoo|Dong-soo Seo|Woo Jung|Jung-Hee Nam|Bon-im Goo|Do-Kyu Ahn|Bi Shin|Joon-hyuk Lee|Yeong-Seok Oh|Hae-eun Kim|Minwoong Lee|Du-Hyung Sung|Jong-ho Cha|In-Gum Jung|Eun-Seok Kim|Seung-hun Kim|In-ho Lee|Sung-ju Lee|Seo-yi Jang|Hi-Kwon Hung|Sung-ki Hong|Oh-Shin Soel|Min-hik Han|Kwong-lak Chuay|Jae-yun Jo|Lu-han Ku|Chul-jun Kim|Young-Shik Park|Jong-goo Kim|Yeong-Cheol Shin|Kyo-hwan Koo
title: Neuk-dae-so-nyeon
